item.title: 7 spring road trips to the most colorful flowers across America
item.description:
7 spring road trips to the most colorful flowers across America

There are many clich√©s about spring, but their ubiquity doesn't diminish how beautiful the changing of the seasons can be. If you need a reminder for how great this season can be, we've got seven road trips across the United States that are perfect for stopping and smelling the roses - and the poppies, bluebonnets and many other wildflowers.

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.

item.title: 100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity
item.description:
100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity

Find your next favorite quote rendered in stunning graphic design.

item.title: Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water
item.description:
Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water

For her series " Shake", pet photographer Carli Davidson photographed curious portraits of dogs shaking off water. Use a fast shutter speed and you can capture all kinds of strange expressions on your dog's face. You can find the rest of the photographs in the series here.
